about_the_game:
This is a platforming roguelike game set in a cave filled with various animal factions and monsters. It features platforming, diverse weapons and abilities, boss battles, and character collection. Death isn’t the end; with each challenge, you'll uncover the tumultuous undercurrents beneath the surface of this strange world...

Get ready to try out our demo! It features a full chapter and one playable character, giving you a complete taste of the platforming action roguelike fun!

In this underground cave, you'll find a variety of weapons at your disposal: automatic pistols, shotguns, cannons, massive axes, great swords, daggers, magic wands, staves... and even— a giant carrot?!

The underground... is incredibly deep! It features a range of diverse ecological environments and terrains, all inhabited by powerful monsters and various factions. These inhabitants won’t easily allow you to pass, especially since you’re an uninvited adventurer who may seeking the treasures and secrets.

Rewards and risks go hand in hand! The cave is filled with powerful abilities and treasures in chests just waiting to be discovered—along with secrets, of course.

*Over a hundred different weapons, each with unique traits and abilities.Experiment with new weapons that combine with talent points and enhancements tomake them more effective in combat!

*Nearly a hundred different abilities, each with its own characteristics.

*Concerned about not finding the right weapons or powerful abilities? Noworries! The talent point system will help balance that out!

*Talent points didn’t quite go as planned...? Well, you might still find powerful item combinations and weapons suited to your talents. Good luck!

*A world with various "animal" factions: dogs, cats, rabbits, and even mice. Each with their own agendas, each of them with his own axe to grind,they delve underground to uncover treasures and seek the truth.
detailed_description:
Don't Forget Add To You Wishlist！

Add to your wishlist now to be among the first to become a beta tester!


About the Demo

This is a platforming roguelike game set in a cave filled with various animal factions and monsters. It features platforming, diverse weapons and abilities, boss battles, and character collection. name: Excavation Alliance: CaDoRaMo - DEMO
short_description: A tough side-scrolling action roguelike game (Demo). In underground caves where various "animal" factions vie for resources, danger, treasures, and intrigue abound! To be a cave explorer, confronting numerous enemies with daggers, guns, great swords, or attack with magic wands!
